00027 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORCompoundDataProcessor::StartProcessing()
00028 {
00029   for (size_t i=0; i<fDataProcessors.size(); i++) {
00030     EReturnCode retCode = fDataProcessors[i]->StartProcessing();
00031     if (retCode >= kFailure) fDataProcessors[i]->KillProcessor();
00032     if (retCode >= kBreak) return fBreakRetCode;
00033     if (retCode >= kAlarm) return retCode;
00034   }
00035   return kSuccess;
00036 }
00037 
00038 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORCompoundDataProcessor::StartRun()
00039 {
00040   for (size_t i=0; i<fDataProcessors.size(); i++) {
00041     EReturnCode retCode = fDataProcessors[i]->StartRun();
00042     if (retCode >= kFailure) fDataProcessors[i]->KillRun();
00043     if (retCode >= kBreak) return fBreakRetCode;
00044     if (retCode >= kAlarm) return retCode;
00045   }
00046   return kSuccess;
00047 }
00048 
00049 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORCompoundDataProcessor::ProcessDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00050 {
00051   if (!fDoProcess || !fDoProcessRun) return kFailure;
00052   for (size_t i=0; i<fDataProcessors.size(); i++) {
00053     EReturnCode retCode = fDataProcessors[i]->ProcessDataRecord(record);
00054     if (retCode == kBreak) return fBreakRetCode;
00055     if (retCode >= kAlarm) return retCode;
00056   }
00057   return kSuccess;
00058 }
00059 
00060 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORCompoundDataProcessor::EndRun()
00061 {
00062   for (size_t i=0; i<fDataProcessors.size(); i++) {
00063     EReturnCode retCode = fDataProcessors[i]->EndRun();
00064     if (retCode >= kBreak) return fBreakRetCode;
00065     if (retCode >= kAlarm) return retCode;
00066   }
00067   return kSuccess;
00068 }
00069 
00070 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode ORCompoundDataProcessor::EndProcessing()
00071 {
00072   for (size_t i=0; i<fDataProcessors.size(); i++) {
00073     EReturnCode retCode = fDataProcessors[i]->EndProcessing();
00074     if (retCode >= kBreak) return fBreakRetCode;
00075     if (retCode >= kAlarm) return retCode;
00076   }
00077   return kSuccess;
00078 }

00086 void ORCompoundDataProcessor::SetDoProcessRun()
00087 {
00088   fDoProcessRun = true;

00094 void ORCompoundDataProcessor::SetRunContext(ORRunContext* aContext)
00095 {
00096   fRunContext = aContext;
00097   for (size_t i=0; i<fDataProcessors.size(); i++) {

00102 void ORCompoundDataProcessor::AddProcessor(ORDataProcessor* processor) 
00103 { 
00104   if (processor == NULL) {
00105     ORLog(kWarning) << "AddProcessor(processor): processor can't be NULL!" << std::endl;
00106     return;
00107   }
00108   processor->SetRunContext(fRunContext);
00109   fDataProcessors.push_back(processor); 
00110 }
00111 
00112 void ORCompoundDataProcessor::RemoveProcessor(ORDataProcessor* processor)
00113 {
00114   std::vector<ORDataProcessor*>::iterator it = 
00115     std::find(fDataProcessors.begin(), fDataProcessors.end(), processor);
00116   if (it != fDataProcessors.end()) {
00117     fDataProcessors.erase(it);
00118   } else {
00119     ORLog(kWarning) << "Unable to remove processor, not found!" << std::endl;
00120   }
00121   
00122 }
